courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: BIOE 571. For Bioinstrumentation majors only.
description: Advanced techniques relating to state-of the art bioinstrumentation technologies. Topics include fluorescence, genomic and proteomic diagnostics, bioinformatics, biosensors, ultrasound imaging, and microscopy. Prerequisite: BIOE 571. For Bioinstrumentation majors only.
label: Biological Measurement II
